'Cause ain't nothing been right around here since Sebastian got murdered.
He was a better person than me,
and damn sure was a better friend than you.
You know... I've been feeling like this should've been me.

translation.en: And then I find this shit?
So, you tell me, am I wrong?
I can't tell if I'm being punked,

Time machines?
I don't think it's a good idea for you to do anything right now, CJ.

translation.en: But I know how to fix this now.
-I... I can handle it. -You know how to fix it?
translation.ko: - 내가 할 수 있어 - 바꿀 방법을 안다고?

translation.en: Explain to me exactly how.
I don't know. I'm just...
Imma jump back earlier or something.

translation.en: You're gonna... You're just gonna jump back earlier or something?
Claudette...
explain to me exactly how you're gonna fix this,
or I swear to God, on Pops'... grave,

translation.en: I'm destroying all them little science experiments you got.

translation.en: Or better yet, getting both your asses killed by them damn thugs?

translation.en: -Yes, but Sebastian didn't deserve this. -No, he didn't.
translation.ko: - 어쨌든 서배스천은 죽으면 안 돼 - 물론이지

translation.en: None of us do.
He didn't, and none of us do.
[sighs] I just need some help first, and then I could devise a plan.

translation.en: Okay, then. I'm going with you.
No, Calvin, have you been listening? There's only one working time machine.

translation.ko: 내가 가야 해 그건 다른 방법이 없어

translation.en: What you need to get it back up and running, man?
Not "what." Who.
Shit!
[in English] CJ! Hey! How...
How you doing? Um...
Sorry about Sebastian.
Shit was crazy. It hit me hard, too.

translation.en: I know. That's actually why I'm here.
Yo. You... Whatever you need. You need someone to talk to or a shoulder to cry on.

translation.en: No, we need your help, okay?

Yo, it's mad late! My abuela ain't gonna let me...
Wait. "We"?
Your bro... You brought your brother to my house?

translation.en: Yeah, and we ain't asking, all right? Five minutes, and bring your tools.

translation.en: Temporal relocation? What... Time travel?
Man, this is... This is stupid crazy! This is like...
[stammers] This shit is...
Yo, what's going on?
[sucks teeth] Y'all gotta stop telling me to be quiet, man.

translation.en: Can you fix it?

My quantum circuit boards, the genius creation that it is,

translation.en: will create an individual time splice for CJ.
translation.ko: CJ를 위해 1인용 시간 접점을 만들 거야

translation.en: All she has to do is attune the frequency
to the TRP Three to the TRP she previously used.
That time splice will allow her to reset that moment in time.

translation.en: This would seamlessly allow her to access

translation.en: You two then jump back to present day.
And Sebastian's alive!
Are you sure about this, bro?
Hell, yeah! I mean, as much as you can theoretically guarantee anything
that has yet to be proven.
But the only way we can know for sure is if we actually do it.

translation.en: Thanks, Eduardo.
You know, I almost feel bad for you.
Really? 'Cause I'm still here, boo, princesa,

-You gotta go, bro. -It's okay. I'm cool.
-Give us some time alone. -I'm cool.

translation.en: You gotta, like, really calm all that down.
-You getting a little too comfortable. -That's cool. I'm cool.
But I'll never forget this, CJ.

translation.en: [grunts] So close...
You good, though? You set?
Your rotor-gamma photon-circuit thingy's connected and all that?

-What? -I know how to avoid Jared

You're just stalling.
-Hand them over. -[sighs]
-You're just loving this, aren't you? -Uh... No. Well, yes.

Take it.
Look, man, make sure you try your hardest to convince me, all right? But just...

I don't want nothing to happen to you.
It's okay.
I'll see you yesterday.
[Jamaican man] What the bla... What the blazes is going...

-What took you so long? -[giggles excitedly]
CJ, what are you... What's going on?
-No time to explain. Come on. We gotta go. -What the fuck did you do?

translation.en: -[laughs] -[man] Hey, sonny.
You all right? You look like you could use a drink.

translation.en: You need a drink.
Yo. We gotta go, dawg. This lame-ass nigga Jared here.
What's up? You 'bout to do something, nigga?
What's up? -Hey, hey, hey! -Get the fuck out of here.

CJ, you're headed the wrong way! We need to go to Carlito's! Come on!

translation.en: Watch where you're going!

[Dennis] Look at her!
Yo, don't let that Jared dude get to you, son.

-[Dennis] Word. -[Calvin] Word.
Calvin! Calvin! Oh, my God! Thank God. Come on, we gotta get out of here.

-Dennis, shut up! Look. -[Sebastian] We have to get outta here.

translation.en: [Sebastian] CJ.
Okay. Okay. Real funny. Very funny, very creative.

translation.ko: '눈에 흙이 들어오기 전엔 못 준다', 그래서 내가 가진 거야

-Yo, fuck y'all. We out, bro. -Calvin! Jesus Christ!

NYPD, where y'all coming from?
-Don't touch your pockets. -Keep your mouth shut.

translation.en: -Officer, the ones you want-- -Keep your mouth shut!
translation.ko: - 그 사람들 저쪽으로 도망쳤어요 - 닥치라고 말했다

translation.en: I'm telling them what's going on!
-What's going on? -Stop talking! I'm serious.
translation.ko: - 입 닥치라고, 나 장난 아냐 - 무슨 일이지?

translation.ko: - 좋아, 신분증 보자 - 잠깐만요, 무슨 일이죠?

-What you need to see IDs for? -IDs, now!

-Calvin. -[officer] Now!

-[Calvin] Bullshit, man. -[officer] Yeah, whatever. Stay put.
-We got the right to know what's going on. -Everyone be quiet, okay?
translation.ko: - 무슨 일인지 알 권리가 있는데요 - 조용히 하고 있어

translation.en: -I didn't mention that. -[CJ] Calvin, no. Stop.
translation.ko: - 아무 말 안 했다 - 캘빈, 안 돼!

translation.en: -On the ground! -He didn't do anything!

-He didn't do anything! -Get on the ground!
-On the ground! -[Sebastian] CJ, let's go!
-Get the fuck down! -Sebastian!
-[CJ] Sebastian! -[Sebastian grunts]
CJ! [grunts]
[officer] Stop resisting!
-[CJ] Sebastian! -[officer] Stay the fuck down!
[Calvin] It's okay.
I'll see you yesterday.
[Sebastian] Why didn't we stick to the plan and stop the robbers at the bodega?
translation.ko: 왜 강도를 막자는 계획대로 안 했어?

translation.en: What?
How many times have you jumped back, CJ?
I'm not stupid! I... You're wearing different clothing.

You got no right to hide shit from me.
-How many times have you jumped back? -Once.
translation.ko: - 몇 번이나 갔어? - 딱 한 번

Why?
We had a surefire plan! And then you come a minute late,

translation.en: and we don't go through with it. Why?

translation.en: Why? I'm asking a question!
Because you died, Sebastian.
You died...
'cause the surefire plan fell through.

translation.en: No, no, no, CJ. You just told me that I get murdered!
translation.ko: 아니, CJ 방금 말했잖아, 나 죽었다고

translation.en: I know. It's because we didn't do it right.
No, CJ, that's it. We're not... We can't do this anymore.

translation.en: You're giving up?
On me?
On Calvin?
I thought your friends were like your chosen family.

translation.en: You are.
I can't afford to lose any more.
[Sebastian] You coming?
Yeah.
I'm sorry.
CJ! CJ! What the fuck are you doing?
Stop! Stop! CJ, don't do this!
Stop! CJ!
Okay.
Five...
Where are the... Where are the keys to the garage?
...four...
[Grandpa] Boy, what is wrong with you?
...three...
CJ...
I love you, Sebastian.
